body:
# Books

_Books_ is a simple Gtk+ 3.0 application to view and manage books in EPUB format.

![Screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/njqnp.png)

## Installation

Configure, compile and install Books with

    ./autogen.sh
    ./configure
    make && sudo make install

Travis says [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/matze/books.png)](https://travis-ci.org/matze/books).

## Dependencies

* Gtk+ 3.0
* WebKitGtk
* libarchive
* sqlite3

If you want to see Books in your language, don't hesitate to contribute by translating Books at [Transifex][].

[Transifex]: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/books/
